attributes.action: Hold Ian Blair accountable for his team's killing of De Menezes and make him resign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A jury has found the Metroplitan Police responsible for the killing of Jean Charles de Menezes. It was a tragic result of a series of stupid mistakes. Ian Blair must take responsibility and resign immediately.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
